name: ShuriDash
description:
ShuriDash is an endless runner. As a ninja move and dodge away from spikes or shuriken, and collect coins.

Controls:

A / Left Arrow - Move Left

D / Right Arrow - Move Right

S / Down Arrow / Shift - Slide

W / Up Arrow / Space - Jump

P / Escape - Pause

Credit:

Audio: OpenGameArt - Level up, power up, Coin - wobbleboxx - wobbleboxx.com - 3 Melee sounds - Original sound by qubodup/Iwan Gabovitch and edited by remaxim - Jumping man sounds - IgnasD YouTube Audio Library - Where We Wanna Go - Patrick Patrikios
